title: The Fat fighters
creator_credit: Scott Whitaker, Wetzel O. Whitaker and Brigham Young University
brief_description: Explains how viewing oneself objectively helps reveal psychological reasons for obesity and consequently leads to permanent weight control, as well as improved self-image.
